bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ji zhong shu xi 肌中鼠鼷 , mice in the muscles. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 quoting ma dao 馬刀 monograph: 肌中鼠 鼷 , “Mice in the muscles”, writes: 肌中竄鼷 , “ Mice scurrying in the muscles ”. Ji zhong shu xi 肌中鼠鼷 , mice in the muscles [1]

Alternative Names ji zhong chuan xi 肌中竄鼷 , mice scurrying in the muscles. Pathological Condition of two or three smooth luo li 瘰癧 , scrofula with pervasion-illness, that grow in a row in the muscles. They have not opened to fester yet and are movable with the skin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ma dao 馬刀 quoting Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 : 肌中鼠 𪖈 writes: 肌中 鼠鼷 , “ Mice in the muscles ”.
